movies.title: Madly in Love
movies.plot: Barnaba, a rude bus driver who enjoys the attention of women, one day meets Principessa Cristina, the princess of a local principality.
movies.simplePlot: Barnaba, a rude bus driver who enjoys the attention of women, one day meets Principessa Cristina, the princess of a local principality.

biography.bio: Adriano Celentano is probably one of the most important singers of Italian pop music, but has also been a creator of a comic genre in the movies, with his characteristic walking and his facial expressions. For the most part, his films were commercially successful, in fact in the 70s and part of the 80s, he was the king of the Italian box office in low budget movies. Probably, as an actor, his best film is Serafino ou L'amour aux champs (1968), directed by Pietro Germi. As a director he frequently casts Ornella Muti, Eleonora Giorgi and his wife Claudia Mori. He and Claudia have three children: Rosalinda Celentano Rosita Celentano and Giacomo Celentano. He also works often as a host for several Italian television shows.
biography.name: Adriano Celentano

biography.bio: Ornella Muti was born on March 9, 1955 in Rome, Lazio, Italy as Francesca Romana Rivelli. She is an actress, known for Flash Gordon (1980), Conte de la folie ordinaire (1981) and Trilogy: Two (2002). She was previously married to Federico Fachinetti and Alessio Orano.
biography.name: Ornella Muti

biography.bio: Sicilian born actor/writer/director was very popular with European audiences, but largely unknown to the west apart from his portrayal of the villainous SPECTRE agent "Emilio Largo" in the spectacular James Bond film Thunderball (1965). However, due to his heavy accent, Celi's voice was dubbed by Robert Rietty. Two years later Celi popped up in the appalling James Bond spoof Operation Kid Brother (1967) starring Neil Connery brother of Sean Connery. Additional to his many film appearances in Italian productions, Celi spent many years on stage in South America to very positive reviews, and directed three films made in South America, Caiçara (1950), Tico-Tico no fuba (1952)_ and L'Alibi (1969)_. He passed away on February 19th 1986 from a heart attack.
biography.name: Adolfo Celi

biography.bio: Milla Sannoner was born on July 29, 1942 in Pesaro, Marche, Italy as Camilla Sannoner. She was an actress, known for Madly in Love (1981), Grand Canyon Massacre (1964) and Del perduto amore (1998). She died on April 14, 2003 in Milan, Lombardy, Italy.
biography.name: Milla Sannoner

actors.character: Betsy, la consorte di Gustavo VI

biography.bio: Enzo Garinei was born on May 4, 1926 in Rome, Lazio, Italy as Vincenzo Garinei. He is an actor, known for Banana Joe (1982), Madly in Love (1981) and Girl with a Suitcase (1961).
biography.name: Enzo Garinei

biography.bio: Corrado Olmi was born on October 24, 1926 in Jesi, Marche, Italy. He is an actor, known for The Cat o' Nine Tails (1971), A Girl in Australia (1971) and 4 mouches de velours gris (1971).
biography.name: Corrado Olmi

biography.bio: Franco Diogene was born on October 20, 1947 in Catania, Sicily, Italy as Concetto Francesco Diogene. He was an actor, known for Midnight Express (1978), The Big Blue (1988) and The Name of the Rose (1986). He was married to Mariella Denari. He died on May 28, 2005 in Genova, Italy.
biography.name: Franco Diogene

biography.bio: Alma Valli is an actress, known for Madly in Love (1981).
biography.name: Alma Valli

biography.bio: Dino Cassio was born on April 2, 1934 in Bari, Puglia, Italy as Leonardo Cassio. He was an actor, known for Badmen of the West (1964), Madly in Love (1981) and Ace (1981). He died on July 9, 2012 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Dino Cassio

biography.bio: Tiberio Murgia was born on February 5, 1929 in Oristano, Sardinia, Italy. He was an actor, known for Big Deal on Madonna Street (1958), La grande guerre (1959) and The Band (1970). He died on August 20, 2010 in Tolfa, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Tiberio Murgia

biography.bio: Silvia Ferluga is an actress, known for Affreux, sales et méchants (1976), Madly in Love (1981) and Oppio per oppio (1972).
biography.name: Silvia Ferluga

biography.bio: Luigi Castejon is an actor, known for Madly in Love (1981), Cristina (1989) and Arriva Cristina (1988).
biography.name: Luigi Castejon

biography.bio: Fulvio Mingozzi is an actor, known for Suspiria (1977), Deep Red (1975) and L'oiseau au plumage de cristal (1970).
biography.name: Fulvio Mingozzi

biography.bio: Vincenzo De Toma was born in 1921. He was an actor, known for Le vieux garçon (1980), L'affare Dreyfuss (1968) and Madly in Love (1981). He died in 1999.
biography.name: Vincenzo De Toma

biography.bio: Gabriella Franchini is an actress, known for Italiano medio (2015), Madly in Love (1981) and Bob Torrent: La peggior serie del Web (2015).
biography.name: Gabriella Franchini
